entry.name: AtkParam ID
entry.description: Attack parameters for bullet impact.

entry.name: Projectile FX ID
entry.description: Visual effect ID for bullet projectile.

entry.name: Impact FX ID
entry.description: Visual effect ID for bullet impact.

entry.name: Flick FX ID
entry.description: Visual effect ID for bullet flick. Normally triggered by guarding.

entry.name: Duration
entry.description: Maximum time before bullet will disappear on its own. -1 means it will last indefinitely.

entry.name: Attenuation Range
entry.description: Distance at which attenuation of the projectile begins.

entry.name: Shoot Interval
entry.description: Time between emitted bullets. Does nothing for bullets that only shoot once.

entry.name: Gravity: In Range
entry.description: Downward acceleration of bullet.

entry.name: Gravity: Out of Range
entry.description: Downward acceleration of bullet after it passes the attenuation distance.

entry.name: Homing Stop Range
entry.description: Bullet will stop homing if it is within this distance of its homing target.

entry.name: Initial Velocity
entry.description: Initial speed of bullet.

entry.name: Acceleration: In Range
entry.description: Forward acceleration acting on bullet before it reaches the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

entry.name: Acceleration: Out of Range
entry.description: Forward acceleration acting on bullet after it passes the attenuation distance. Negative values will slow the bullet down.

entry.name: Max Velocity
entry.description: Maximum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

entry.name: Min Velocity
entry.description: Minimum speed of bullet, regardless of acceleration.

entry.name: Acceleration Duration
entry.description: Time that acceleration is active after bullet creation.

entry.name: Homing Start Distance
entry.description: Distance from owner at which the bullet starts homing in on targets.

entry.name: Initial Hit Radius
entry.description: Initial hit radius of bullet projectile.

entry.name: Final Hit Radius
entry.description: Final hit radius of bullet projectile. Set to -1 if radius does not change, which is always coupled with a value of 0 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

entry.name: Radius Spread Time
entry.description: Time taken by bullet to transition from initial to final hit radius. Value of 0 are always coupled with values of -1 for RadiusIncreaseDuration.

entry.name: Explosion Delay
entry.description: Delay between impact and 'explosion'.

entry.name: Homing Offset Range
entry.description: Offset homing position by this amount.

entry.name: Hitbox Duration
entry.description: Duration of bullet impact hitbox. A value of zero means it is disabled immediately after first impact.

entry.name: External Force
entry.description: Unknown

entry.name: Owner Effect ID
entry.description: Special effect applied to owner when bullet is created.

entry.name: Bullet AI
entry.description: AI parameter ID for triggered floating bullets.

entry.name: Hit Bullet ID
entry.description: Bullet emitted on impact of this bullet.

entry.name: Target Effect ID 0
entry.description: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target Effect ID 1
entry.description: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target Effect ID 2
entry.description: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target Effect ID 3
entry.description: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Target Effect ID 4
entry.description: Special effect applied to target hit by bullet.

entry.name: Bullet Count
entry.description: Number of bullets emitted at once.

entry.name: Homing Angle
entry.description: Turning angle of homing bullet per second.

entry.name: Horizontal Shoot Angle
entry.description: Angle of first bullet in degrees around the vertical axis, relative to the forward direction.

entry.name: Shoot Angle - Horizontal Interval
entry.description: Angle from one bullet to the next around the vertical axis, beginning at the azimuth angle start.

entry.name: Shoot Angle - Vertical Interval
entry.description: Angle between bullets in elevation.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Physical
entry.description: Percentage reduction in physical damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Magic
entry.description: Percentage reduction in magic damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Fire
entry.description: Percentage reduction in fire damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Lightning
entry.description: Percentage reduction in lightning damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Stamina
entry.description: Percentage reduction in stamina damage per second.

entry.name: Damage Falloff: Knockback
entry.description: Percentage reduction in knockback power per second.

entry.name: Vertical Shoot Angle
entry.description: Angle of elevation of first bullet. Positive values will angle the bullets up and negative values will angle the bullets down.

entry.name: Lock Shoot Limit Angle
entry.description: Unknown

entry.name: Is Object Penetration
entry.description: Bullet will go through objects, players, and NPCs.

entry.name: Previous Velocity Direction Rate
entry.description: Ratio of adding the previous moving direction to the current direction when a sliding bullet hits the wall.

entry.name: Attack Attribute
entry.description: Attack type.

entry.name: Effect Attribute
entry.description: Element attached to bullet hit.

entry.name: Material Attack Type
entry.description: Determines visual effects of bullet hit.

entry.name: Material Attack Material
entry.description: Sound and visual effects on hit.

entry.name: Material Size
entry.description: 'Size' of attack.

entry.name: Launch Condition Type
entry.description: Condition for determing if a new bullet will be generated when this bullet lands or expires.

entry.name: Persistent Attack FX
entry.description: Set whether bullets stay stuck upon impact.

entry.name: Continuous Hitbox
entry.description: Bullet hitbox is continuous.

entry.name: Penetrate Map
entry.description: Bullet will pierce the map.

entry.name: Hit Both Teams
entry.description: Bullet can hit any character.

entry.name: Use Shared Hit List
entry.description: Repeating bullets share the amount of times they have hit a target.

entry.name: Use Multiple Model Points
entry.description: Set to True if the same model point ('damipoly') is used multiple times when spawning the bullet.

entry.name: Can be Deflected by Magic
entry.description: If true, this bullet will impact appropriate Force-type magic (e.g. arrows, bolts, knives).

entry.name: Ignore FX On Water Hit
entry.description: If true, hit FX are not produced if the bullet impacts water.

entry.name: Ignore State Transition On Water Hit
entry.description: Unclear effect, but True for knives/arrows/bolts and False otherwise.

entry.name: Can Be Deflected By Bullet Deflection
entry.description: If True, this bullet will be deflected by AtkParam deflection effect.

entry.name: Sp Homing Y Angle For Enemy
